/* SiteMapper.selectList */ SELECT COUNT(1) OVER() AS total_count , SIT.idx , SIT.nm , SIT.type , SIT.url , SIT.query , SIT.lastval , SIT.reg_idx , SIT.reg_dt , SIT.chg_idx , SIT.chg_dt , SIT.del_dt , STRING_AGG(HEA.key || '=' || HEA.val) AS "header" , STRING_AGG(BDY.key || '=' || BDY.val) AS "form_body" , REG.nm AS "reg_nm" , CHG.nm AS "chg_nm" , GRR.nm AS "reg_grd_nm" , GRC.nm AS "chg_grd_nm" FROM SELECT * FROM site SIT LEFT OUTER JOIN header HEA ON SIT.idx = HEA.site_idx LEFT OUTER JOIN formbody BDY ON SIT.idx = BDY.site_idx LEFT OUTER JOIN usr REG ON SIT.reg_idx = REG.idx LEFT OUTER JOIN usr CHG ON SIT.chg_idx = CHG.idx LEFT OUTER JOIN grd GRR ON REG.idx = GRR.idx LEFT OUTER JOIN grd GRC ON CHG.idx = GRC.idx WHERE 1=1
AND INSTR(SIT.idx, #{idx}) > 0
AND INSTR(SIT.nm, #{nm}) > 0
AND INSTR(SIT.type, #{type}) > 0
AND INSTR(SIT.url, #{url}) > 0
AND INSTR(SIT.query, #{query}) > 0
AND INSTR(SIT.lastval, #{lastval}) > 0
AND INSTR(SIT.reg_idx, #{regIdx}) > 0
AND INSTR(SIT.reg_dt, #{regDt}) > 0
AND INSTR(SIT.chg_idx, #{chgIdx}) > 0
AND INSTR(SIT.chg_dt, #{chgDt}) > 0
AND INSTR(SIT.del_dt, #{delDt}) > 0
AND INSTR(HEA.idx, #{headerIdx}) > 0
AND INSTR(HEA.key, #{headerKey}) > 0
AND INSTR(HEA.val, #{headerVal}) > 0
AND INSTR(BDY.idx, #{bodyIdx}) > 0
AND INSTR(BDY.key, #{bodyKey}) > 0
AND INSTR(BDY.val, #{bodyVal}) > 0

/* SiteMapper.selectOne */ SELECT SIT.idx , SIT.nm , SIT.type , SIT.url , SIT.query , SIT.lastval , SIT.reg_idx , SIT.reg_dt , SIT.chg_idx , SIT.chg_dt , SIT.del_dt , HEA.idx AS "header_idx" , HEA.key AS "header_key" , HEA.val AS "header_val" , BDY.idx AS "body_idx" , BDY.key AS "body_key" , BDY.val AS "body_val" FROM SELECT * FROM site SIT LEFT OUTER JOIN header HEA ON SIT.idx = HEA.site_idx LEFT OUTER JOIN formbody BDY ON SIT.idx = BDY.site_idx WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{id}
